entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is about to turn seventeen. He is being protected by magic until his seventeenth birthday.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is taking care of Harry Potter. He has a long black cloak and a hat.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, which is perched on his trunk.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is frowning slightly as he tries to remember if he has ever been mistreated.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: One of Harry's uncles, who looks like he has something stuck in his throat.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: One of Harry's aunts, who is oddly flushed.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry Potter are leaving the Dursleys' house together, with Dumbledore leading the way.
Harry Potter owns Hedwig, his owl, which is perched on his trunk.
